summary: This is a marriage of my Immaculate Dwarven armor retexture found in the Forgotten City with Nisetanakas Dwarven bikini armor.
descriptionHtml:
Glorious Dwarven Bikini armor is a marriage of my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77813]Immaculate Dwarven armor[/url] retexture found in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70219]The Forgotten City[/url] with Nisetanakas [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76214]Dwarven bikini  armor[/url].  It was made as a request after the release of my Immaculate Dwarven Armor mod.  This mod adds environment mapping that was left out of the original [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76214]Dwarven Bikini armor[/url].  I used dedicated textures, so they will not effect the vanilla Dwarven armor.

REQUIREMENT:
   Nisetanakas Dwarven Bikini Armor main file (7BO).  Since this mod edits his meshes, only this body is supported for now.

INSTALLATION:
   Download with mod manager of your choice.  If you want to use textures other than the ones I've provided, then place the textures of the same name from [textures/armor/dwarven/m] and [textures/actors/dwarvenspherecenturion] into folder [textures/armor/dwarvenbikini].

CREDIT
   -Nisetanaka for his fantastic armor
   -TheModernStoryteller for the inspiring quest
author: Wolflord13
